Ok, so you are interested in Ubuntu and would like to know how to learn more and get involved with Ubuntu beyond our wonderful LoCo team?  That's great!

<nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/participate/|Get Involved]]</nowiki> & <nowiki>[[ContributeToUbuntu]]</nowiki>

Teams? - Global <nowiki>[[Teams]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/|Mail lists]]</nowiki>

Outreach - <nowiki>[[ReleaseParty]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[UbuntuOpenWeek]]</nowiki>

Other !LoCos - <nowiki>[[LoCoTeams]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[USTeams-TeamList]]</nowiki>

Contributing - <nowiki>[[UbuntuDeveloperWeek]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[UbuntuGlobalJam]]</nowiki>

Membership & Validation - Create a <nowiki>[[https://help.launchpad.net/YourAccount/NewAccount|Launchpad ID]]</nowiki> (used by wiki as well), <nowiki>[[WikiName]]</nowiki> page, IRC nickname <nowiki>[[http://freenode.net/faq.shtml#userregistration|registered]]</nowiki> on freenode.net, GPG Key uploaded to launchpad, Keysigning and Code of Conduct <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/GnuPrivacyGuardHowto|signed]]</nowiki>, add ssh key to Launchpad (used for bzr checkins), Ubuntu <nowiki>[[Membership]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/newmember|intro]]</nowiki>)
